profile.deleteAccountTitle: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
profile.deleteAccountSubtitle: Once deleted, all your data including shifts, chats, and profile will be permanently removed.
profile.logoutTitle: Are you sure you want to logout your account?
profile.logoutSubtitle: You will be signed out from your account. Your data will remain safe and intact.
profile.cancelPlanSubtitle: Your current plan will remain active until [expiry date]. You can continue using features until then.
profile.googlePayBillingNote: Contact Google Pay to update your payment details or end your billing through Google Pay.

api.unauthorized: You are not authorized. Please log in again.
api.business_member_already_exists: This user is already a member of the business.
api.otp_expired: OTP has expired. Please request a new one.
api.internal_server_error: Something went wrong on the server. Please try again.
api.bad_request: Please check your input and try again.
api.experience_invalid_date_range: Start date must be before end date.
api.weekly_block_start_must_follow_previous: Weekly block start must follow the previous block.
api.weekly_block_manage_from_manage_screen: This week is already scheduled. Use Manage Weekly Schedules to edit or delete it.
api.experiences.0.startDate must be a valid: Experience start date must be a valid ISO 8601 date string.
